text: All customers affected by the #powercut in #TA6 #Taunton now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #B33 #Birminham & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 20:30.  Siân
There is currently a #powercut in #Plymouth #PL4 & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 20:00.  Siân
Update #powercut #Taunton #TA6 & surrounding areas. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 18:30. Geraint
There is currently a #powercut in #Taunton #TA6 & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 13:30 , Kirsten
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Hereford #HR1 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Geraint
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Kennford #EX6 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
There is currently a #powercut in #Kennford #EX6 & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 13:30. Geraint
Apologies for the #powercut in #Hereford #HR1 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 12:00. Geraint
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Sulgrave #OX16 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconveniene. David.
Engineers continue to work on the #powercut in #Sulgrave #OX17 and are now estimating ro restore all those still affected by 05:00. Our apologies for the delay and any inconvenience. David.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Hereford #HR2 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in #OX17 #Sulgrave and surrounding areas. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 23:30. Siân
Engineers are working on a #powercut in #Hereford #HR2 and estimate to restore all supplies by 21:30. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Bristol #BS31 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Bristol #BS31 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 08:30. Andi.
All supplies to the #Stafford #ST18 area have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut. Andi.
We are aware that properties are without power in the #Stafford #ST18 and surrounding areas. We aim to restore all supplies by 07:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut Andi.
We are sorry about the #powercut in #Newbridge #NP11 and surrounding areas.  Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 22:00.
